title: Transport codes from svn to git
date: 2015-12-07 11:59:14
categories: 
- Job  
tags: 
- Svn
- Git  
---
## 1. install git client
download git client from github  
## 2. new git project  
```
cd dir    
git clone http://ip:port/user/project.git    
git init  
git remote add origin git@ip:user/project.git  
```
and so on  

<!-- more -->  

## 3. edit .ignore file
edit in .ignore like this     
```
*.bak
*.txt
*.vm
.gitignore
#svn
.svn/
# built application files
*.apk
*.ap_

# files for the dex VM
*.dex

# Java class files
*.class

# generated files
bin/
gen/

# Local configuration file (sdk path, etc)
local.properties

# Eclipse project files
.classpath
.project

# Proguard folder generated by Eclipse
proguard/

# Intellij project files
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws
.idea/
```

## 4. commit & push
```
git add .  
git commit -m "init"  
git -u origin master  
```
reflesh:  
```
git rm -r --cached .  
git add .  
git commit -m "fixed untracked files"  
git -u origin master  
```
